channel.title: How could i run 2 servers at once
channel.description: Hmm, well I need to figure out how to run 2 servers at once. I am on wireless. I have one server on one pc and i need to set up one on this one. How would I do it?

item.title: How could i run 2 servers at once
item.dc:creator: @poopy1 poopy1
item.description:
@poopy1 wrote:

Use a hamachi and a no-ip? I dont know but it would be interesting to see to ran at a time cause when you run 2 servers it says Listing on another post. Post 43595 is in use? would you switch the ip? Anyways good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: How could i run 2 servers at once

@Vladie wrote:

Alright thanks both of you. Glad to see someone can help me

item.title: How could i run 2 servers at once
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:4, topic:155170”]ahh,knew i forgot something.
Thanks lol[/quote]

no problem, i thought that at first. but if he has 2 computers then it will work

EDIT; in server.java make one port 43594 and one 5555 port forward both and open them in firwall

Read full topic

item.title: How could i run 2 servers at once
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:2, topic:155170”]Make 2 no-ip accounts.
get 2-no ip’s
get 2 different sources/or the same.
Open 2 ducs
open 2 runservers[/quote]

wouldn’t work 1 because no-ip likes your ip to the address so he’d have 2 no-ips to same server.

he needs to change port on one of them thats all.

Read full topic
item.source: How could i run 2 servers at once
